text: Results for the Quarterfinals, also called the Playoffs of the 2014–15 Euroleague basketball tournament. The quarterfinals will be played in April 2015. Team #1 (i.e., the group winner in each series) will host Games 1 and 2, plus Game 5 if it is necessary. Team #2 will host Game 3, plus Game 4 if necessary. ==Summary== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=250|Team 1 !width=80| !width=250|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 !width=80|Game 4 |- | bgcolor="#ccffcc" align=right|Real Madrid ||3–1|| align=left| Anadolu Efes||80–71||90–85||72–75||76–63 |- | bgcolor="#ccffcc" align=right|CSKA Moscow ||3–1|| align=left| Panathinaikos||93–66||100–80||85–86||74–55 |- | align=right|FC Barcelona ||1–3|| bgcolor="#ccffcc" align=left| Olympiacos ||73–57||63–76||71–73||68–71 |- | bgcolor="#ccffcc" align=right|Fenerbahçe Ülker ||3–0|| align=left| Maccabi Electra||80–72||82–67||75–74 |} ==Game 1== ==Game 2== ==Game 3== ==Game 4== ==References== Quarter-finals
title: 2014–15 Euroleague Quarterfinals
